aboutDescription: This is your chance to shine! Write an epic and captivating description that truly captures the essence of your memecoin. Be creative, make it unforgettable, and ensure no one can ignore it!

steps.title: Create a Wallet
steps.description: Download Metamask or your preferred wallet.

steps.title: Get Some ETH
steps.description: Fund your wallet with ETH to swap for $memecoin.

steps.title: Go to Uniswap
steps.description: Connect your wallet and paste the $memecoin contract address.

steps.title: Create a Wallet

steps.title: Go to Jupiter
